name: Lava Leap (Vimlark)
description:
Play the floor is lava in this 2D top down platformer.

Made for the Backeys Game Jam 
Theme: It is not real

What is more not real than the lava in the floor is lava?

Due to time there is only 5 levels but there is a speed run mode that will track your best time to get through all the levels in a row. 

Controls - Keyboard:
Move: Arrow Keys / WASD / QZSD 
Jump: Space / L
Run: Shift / K
Pause/Options: P

Controls - Gamepad:
Move: Left Analog / D-Pad 
Jump: South Button
Run: West Button / Triggers
Pause/Options: Start (option... whatever it's called)

Assets used:
Font made by Chrisblue 
https://opengameart.org/content/type7r-spritefont

Control UI made by egordorichev
https://egordorichev.itch.io/key-set
